title: Geo Coordinates
description: The geographic coordinates of a place. Based on http://schema.org/GeoCoordinates.

xdm:id.title: Coordinates Id
xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the coordinates.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: A description of what the coordinates identify.

xdm:latitude.title: Latitude
xdm:latitude.description: The signed vertical coordinate of a geographic point.

xdm:longitude.title: Longitude
xdm:longitude.description: The signed horizontal coordinate of a geographic point.

xdm:altitude.title: Altitude
xdm:altitude.description: The specific altitude of the defined coordinate. The value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
